results.name: Ramanujan sum c_n(5).
reference: T. M. Apostol, Introduction to Analytic Number Theory, Springer-Verlag, 1976.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537

Eckford Cohen, A class of arithmetic functions, Proc. Natl. Acad. Sci. USA 41 (1955), 939-944.

M. L. Fredman, A symmetry relationship for a class of partitions, J. Combinatorial Theory Ser. A 18 (1975), 199-202.

formula: Lambert series and a consequence: Sum_{n >= 1} c_n(5) * z^n / (1 - z^n) = z + 5*z^5 and -Sum_{n >= 1} (c_n(5) / n) * log(1 - z^n) = z + z^5 for |z| < 1 (using the principal value of the logarithm). - _Petros Hadjicostas_, Aug 24 2019
mathematica: a[n_] := EulerPhi[n] * MoebiusMu[n/GCD[n, 5]] / EulerPhi[n/GCD[n, 5]]; Table[ a[n], {n, 1, 105}]
results.author: Yuval Dekel (dekelyuval(AT)hotmail.com), Aug 15 2003
ext: More terms from _Robert G. Wilson v_ and _Benoit Cloitre_, Aug 17 2003
